author: AP
title: NCAA weighs more eligibility for sports cut short by virus
description: The NCAA Division I Council is scheduled to vote on Monday whether to provide another year of eligibility to spring sport athletes
content:
The NCAA Division I Council is scheduled to vote Monday on whether to allow another year of eligibility for spring sport athletes such as baseball, softball and lacrosse players, who had their seasons wiped out by the coronavirus pandemic.
Providing similar … [+2667 chars]
